title: ‘Pitstops are part of racing’
summary: The big controversy at Monza was McLaren’s dilemma in asking Oscar Piastri to surrender second position to team-mate Lando Norris after the latter had suffered a delay at his pitstop.…

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary role of a pitstop in Formula 1 racing?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To change tires and make adjustments to the car.
wrong_options: To discuss strategy with the driver
To allow the driver to rest
